subject: Fw: Thank you, we are accepting your application
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
 
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this lot will expire TONIGHT):
 
$404,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this quick form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
 
http://duplejkxiformrx.com/
